post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
작성자   : Richard Yoon

Hello everybody,

I am a recent graduate from the University of Waterloo majoring in Mathematics and minoring in Computer Science.  Right now, my experience lies in software development and testing but I wish to pursue a career as a Oracle DBA.  I have looked into various programs available, but am unsure as to the best approach for such an area.

Could anyone provide any advice into this matter?
post.title: [2001/08/25] Looking for advice
